function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Occupant behavior leading to virus transmission","Impact":"Spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implementing measures to reduce close contact and promote hygiene","Technologies":"Occupancy Simulator, visualization tools","People":"Building occupants, public health","Owner":"Facility management, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Complex human behaviors with temporal dynamics","Impact":"Difficulty in understanding and analyzing data","Mitigation":"Developing advanced visualization techniques for complex behavioral data","Technologies":"Advanced visualization tools, data analytics","People":"Researchers, data analysts","Owner":"Research institutions, data analytics teams"},{"Description":"Limitation in understanding holistic overview of data","Impact":"Inadequate insights into space occupancy and behaviors","Mitigation":"Developing comprehensive visualization methods for space occupancy data","Technologies":"Interactive visualization methods, 3D modeling","People":"Building designers, facility managers, researchers","Owner":"Building design firms, research institutions"}]}
